Text: I feel like a retard as I downloaded this and used 5 minutes of web searching before I found out it was a Wii file >.>
i want to play on pc :(
How do you get this on your Wii?
theres an emulator called ''dolphin'' that allows Wii and Gamecube games to be played on PC, if you meet the reccomended requirements... google is your friend :D

Works great on Dolphin.
Thanks for the upload. Wanted to try it out as a demo. Ended up buying the Steam version

If any one wants to play on the pc use Dolphin
http://dolphin-emulator.com/
